title: 106_s485
content: Urban Homestead Act of 1999 - Directs the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to: (1) semiannually publish in the Federal Register a list of unoccupied multifamily housing projects, substandard housing projects, and other residential property owned by the Department of Housing and Urban Development for at least six months. And (2) transfer ownership to a requesting community development corporation. Directs the Secretary to satisfy any related indebtedness. Exempts such property transfers from disposition requirements under the Multifamily Housing Property Disposition Reform Act of 1994.
